resources.string: Nalanda Institute of Engineering and Technology

About: Nalanda Institute of Engineering and Technology college has a picturesque, spreading campus, about 40 acres. The College has 6 disciplines of Engineering leading to B.Tech degree awarded by JNTU in (ECE, EEE, CSE, IT, MECH, CIVIL). It is equipped with lecture-halls, laboratories, Computer Center, library and all the prescribed facilities.
Siddharth Nagar, Kantepudi, Sattenapalli, Guntur, Andhra Pradesh 522438
